name: Vimanet
description:
Vimanet is a software development company specialized in web development and cloud applications. We work agile and focus on automating software delivery processes in order to respond fast to customer demands. Cloud serverless computing is our environment as we believe that infrastructure limitations should not stop companies from innovation and global expansion.
Since the beginning, we deliver services globally to small and large businesses in Norway, Belgium, Switzerland, UK, Ireland, and the US.
Vimanet is also a Microsoft ISV Partner and Microsoft Azure Reseller.
